profile.intro: My name is Jarod Kohler and I started creating this site in 2023 to showcase my development skills, as well as my personal and academic projects. I am a computer engineering student at INSA Lyon after obtaining a BUT in the same field at IUT de Belfort.
profile.passions: Outside of programming, I am passionate about video games, creative hobbies, sports, travel, and cars. These activities allow me to escape, stimulate my creativity, stay active, and discover new horizons.
profile.values: I am a curious person, always seeking new knowledge and challenges. I place great importance on integrity, teamwork, and innovation. For me, each project is an opportunity to learn and grow, both professionally and personally.

contact.title: Let's keep in touch!
contact.available: I am available to discuss about your project!
contact.notAvailable: I am not available right now for a new opportunity.

alt.logo: Logo of Jarod Kohler, it is the first name and last name in blue and red chevrons.
